title: Switch default custom domain to jpdigitalmarketing.in in provisioning UI

requirements.summary: Replace the default/recommended custom domain and all provisioning UI example references from jpdigitalmarketing.net to jpdigitalmarketing.in, including post-reset behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: When the backend returns no configured custom domain, the custom domain input is pre-filled with "jpdigitalmarketing.in".
All user-facing example text in the provisioning/publishing UI that previously referenced "jpdigitalmarketing.net" now references "jpdigitalmarketing.in" (including alerts and descriptions).
After using the "Delete/Reset site configuration" action, the UI resets the custom domain input back to the default "jpdigitalmarketing.in" and reflects the unconfigured/offline state.

file_operations.description: Update DEFAULT_CUSTOM_DOMAIN from "jpdigitalmarketing.net" to "jpdigitalmarketing.in" and ensure all user-facing example strings and placeholders that reference the default domain reflect ".in"; confirm reset flow sets the input back to the new default and the prefill effect still applies when backend domain is null. The UI uses shadcn-ui components (Card, Input, Alert, etc.) for the provisioning pageâ€”verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
